scripts.setup: concurrently "npm install" "cd app && npm install" "cd server/functions && npm install"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd app && npm run dev" "cd server/functions && npm run serve"
scripts.dev:watch: concurrently "cd app && npm run dev" "cd server/functions && npm run serve:dev"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd app && npm test" " cd server/functions && npm test"
